description.value:
Potion, common
This pearlescent fluid perpetually swirls inside its container with a slow kaleidoscopic churn. When you drink this potion, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.P7mF2MxSuVJwHRRY]{guidance} spell for 1 hour at will. You can end this effect early as an action and gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.4v2H3hHb3Ph9XLNd]{augury} spell. If you do, you are afflicted with short-term madness after learning the spellâ€™s results.
